item.title: Afra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "My tastes are simple: I am easily satisfied with the best." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Afra add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Only those are fit to live who do not fear to die; and none are fit to die who have shrunk from the joy of life and the duty of life. Both life and death are parts of the same Great Adventure." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Afra add a quote by AVICENNA
item.description: "The world is divided into men who have wit and no religion and men who have religion and no wit. " -- AVICENNA

item.title: Afra add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Believe you can and you're halfway there." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Afra add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Afra add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "The only man who never makes mistakes is the man who never does anything." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Afra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A fanatic is one who can't change his mind and won't change the subject." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Afra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Personally, I'm always ready to learn, although I do not always like being taught." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Afra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Afra add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Afra add a quote by OMAR KHAYYAM
item.description: "Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life." -- OMAR KHAYYAM

item.title: Afra add a quote by Omar Khayyam
item.description: "When I want to understand what is happening today or try to decide what will happen tomorrow, I look back." -- Omar Khayyam

item.title: Afra add a quote by FERDOWSI
item.description: "How shall a man escape from that which is written; How shall he flee from his destiny? " -- FERDOWSI

item.title: Afra add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "Remember for just one minute of the day, it would be best to try looking upon yourself more as God does, for She knows your true royal nature." -- Hafiz of Shiraz

item.title: Afra add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "I wish I could show you when you are lonely or in darkness the astonishing light of your own being." -- Hafiz of Shiraz

item.title: Afra add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "This sky where we live is no place to lose your wings so love, love, love." -- Hafiz of Shiraz

item.title: Afra add a quote by Hafiz of Shiraz
item.description: "We have come into this exquisite world to experience ever and ever more deeply our divine courage,freedom and light!" -- Hafiz of Shiraz
